text: My nisposlali Koran, podtverzhdonnyy Bozhestvennoy mudrost'yu. V nom istinnaya vera i spravedlivyye zakony. My poslali tebya (o prorok!) lish' tol'ko blagovestnikom dlya veruyushchikh ob ozhidayushchem ikh raye i uveshchevatelem dlya neveruyushchikh ob ozhidayushchem ikh ade. Ved' ne tvoy grekh, yesli oni ne uveruyut
